_header: Man that will of wisdom hearen / At wise Hendyng he may leren
_description: The Proverbs of Hendyng, with six introductory lines prefixed

CULAdd4407d.First Lines:
At wise hending he may lerneþat was marcolfes
                    sone…
CULAdd4407d.Last Lines:
…þer if it mote hand all is willeWilton nilton it schal
                    spille

CamGon351.Transcription:
Meni man syngatwan he hom bringatA fayr ȝung wys
                        [sic]& hym he by þoȝte& wyste
                    wat he broȝtea myȝte wepe all hys lyf

Wenzel,  Siegfried.

Laing,  Margaret.

                        line).

BLHar2253.First Lines:
Mon þat wol of wysdam herenAt wyse Hendyng he may
                    leren…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…þat sit in heuene vs aboueȜeue vs god
                    endynge
